Static Site Generators (presentation)

I gave a presentation at Second Wednesday in Nottingham to over 100 people on the use of Static Site Generators for blog hosting.

As a precursor to this presentation, Second Wednesday also published an interview with me.

HTML5 and how to use it (presentation)

I gave a presentation to the digital department at IPC Media on HTML5.

Let’s talk about CSS (presentation)

I gave a presentation to the digital department at IPC Media about CSS best practice and the potential benefits of CSS preprocessors.

Micro-generation schemes (journal paper)

Following a piece of coursework I did for my MSc, I collaborated with my supervisors on a journal paper entitled “Micro-generation schemes: user behaviours and attitudes towards energy consumption”.

Other publications

  • Could mobile internet help solve the digital divide in the UK? (MSc dissertation)
  • The effect of mobile internet usability on lower income groups (MSc presentation)
  • Issues affecting people's behaviour towards refuse recycling in the home (MSc presentation)

My blog

I have a blog about web dev, politics and my random thoughts which I post to a few times a month.

Please copy, modify and reshare my work.
